alfredsnippet.snippet:
"The National Science Board estimates that more than a third of Americans do not understand that Earth orbits the Sun and that two-thirds are unaware of the big bang origin of the universe."

- New Worlds, New Horizons in Astronomy and Astrophysics (2010), Committee for a Decadal Survey of Astronomy and Astrophysics; National Research Council
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Public Understanding of Space
